name: Replace the Lamp
description:
Replace the Lamp is a simple horror game with a short story, you only have to go around the rooms in this haunted house and change the lights in each room, this game has 4 different endings, and there is 1 secret ending.

Story:

You as an electrician, you get a customer who has a strange problem in his house, suddenly all the light bulbs in his house are broken, and they have to be replaced, and you have to replace all the light bulbs in his house. You get to his house and after a few bulbs are plugged in something happens...

From the Creator of :

Controls:
  • W.A.S.D = Walking
  • LMB = Interact
  • Mouse Motion = Look
Dev Notes:

Hi!, thanks for being interested in viewing this game page, if you are interested in the game download it now, the game is FREE, but if you want to support me as a free game developer, don't hesitate to donate, however much you donate it will really help YapGamedev for develop to produce higher quality games. thanks!

If you find this game on any other platform than itch.io, please let me know, because most likely it's a reuploader and they stole this game! thanks.

A Game by YapGamedev made with Unity.
